patterns.name: Role assignment
patterns.description: Map the incoming intent to the agent that specializes in that domain.
patterns.example: If query mentions payroll, select the HR agent.

patterns.name: Task delegation
patterns.description: Route the request payload, context, and policy hints to the chosen agent.
patterns.example: Pass the conversation history plus policy tokens to the Technical agent.

patterns.name: Conversational handoffs
patterns.description: Store agent responses and user confirmations to maintain thread continuity.
patterns.example: Keep the last two turns from each agent in the conversation state.
